title: Bug via Web Form
description:
**Bug reported via web form**

**Reporter:** Anonymous

**Description:**
Add questions to the header

**Submitted:** 2025-10-29T16:07:27.326Z
note: Feature request to add questions/FAQ section to site header. This would improve user navigation and provide quick access to common questions.
resolution: Added UNIVERSAL_HELP_SYSTEM.js to index.html and workspace-v3.html. This provides comprehensive 3-tier help system with: 1) Context-aware tips, 2) Araya AI chat widget with FAQ quick buttons, 3) Emergency help button. Users can now access questions/help on every page.
commit: afed6eb - Add Universal Help System to Landing & Workspace Pages
